title: Serious connection issues to client
body: Lately been having a serious issue with the client where i can't even load my own summoner page let alone log in without needing to wait for a good 3 minutes. Asked friends and they told me nothing's wrong with their client, i checked my speed on Speedtest.net and there's nothing wrong with it. Wondering whether this is a bug or something I've done.

replies.body: What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
